entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clear. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Fog patches developing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of showers. High 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming south 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the morning then light late in the afternoon. High 11. Wind chill minus 10 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:34 PM EDT Saturday 8 April 2023
